# Mykola Rudnev - Senior Front-End Developer Portfolio

## Overview
Mykola Rudnev is a Senior Front-End Developer based in Lublin, Poland, with over 5 years of experience. He specializes in building high-performance web applications and e-commerce platforms using React.js, Next.js, TypeScript, and Magento 2.

## Contact Information
- **Email:** rudnevmykola@gmail.com
- **Phone:** +48 790 240 418
- **LinkedIn:** [Mykola Rudnev](https://www.linkedin.com/in/mykola-rudnev-1525a5145/)
- **GitHub:** [MykolaRudnev](https://github.com/MykolaRudnev)
- **Portfolio:** [https://www.mrudnev.com/](https://www.mrudnev.com/)

## Technical Skills
- **Core:** JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3
- **Frameworks:** React.js, Next.js, Gatsby.js, Magento 2, Hyv√§, WordPress
- **Styling:** Tailwind CSS, Styled Components, SASS/LESS
- **Tools:** Git, Docker, JIRA, Azure DevOps, Figma, Adobe XD
- **APIs:** REST, GraphQL

## Work Experience
1. **For Better Future Software House** (Aug 2020 - Present) - Senior Front-End Developer
   - Developed high-traffic e-commerce sites (Magento 2).
   - Built recruitment and corporate websites (Next.js, Gatsby).
2. **3mk Protection** (Mar 2024 - Jun 2024) - Front-End Developer
   - Magento 2 custom theme development and optimization.
3. **ORBA** (Jan 2020 - Apr 2020) - Junior Front-End Developer
   - E-commerce development for the cosmetics industry.

## Key Projects
- **Ponadczasowi:** Optimized Next.js e-commerce site for watches.
- **Copernicspace:** NFT marketplace built from scratch with Next.js.
- **Housetipster:** Full Magento 2 e-commerce build.
- **PMI Careers:** Recruitment website migration to Next.js.
- **Internorm:** Corporate site using Gatsby.js & WordPress.
- **HRK:** Recruitment platform with Gatsby.

## Education
- Engineer of Computer Science, University of Economics and Innovation in Lublin (2014 - 2018)
